title: The Unexpected Heroism of Pit Wilson
summary: A retired lecturer, Pit Wilson, uses his old skills and newfound powers to save his town over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Ein pensionierter Dozent, Pit Wilson, nutzt seine alten Fähigkeiten und neu entdeckten Kräfte, um seine Stadt im Verlauf einer Woche zu retten.
summaryDutch: Een gepensioneerde docent, Pit Wilson, gebruikt zijn oude vaardigheden en nieuw gevonden krachten om zijn stad te redden gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Un conférencier retraité, Pit Wilson, utilise ses anciennes compétences et ses nouveaux pouvoirs pour sauver sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Pit Wilson discovered his power to control time after a mystical encounter in his basement. Energized, he decided to use it to help others.
Using his power, Pit paused time to save a child from a runaway car, feeling triumphant in his newfound role as a protector.
During a lecture on local history, Pit felt an eerie sense of danger. He later used his time-control to prevent a bank robbery.
Pit grew thoughtful and somewhat sad about the loneliness of his secret. He spent the day reflecting on his past, feeling a mix of nostalgia and isolation.
While guiding a group through a museum, Pit sensed a thief. He used his abilities to retrieve stolen artifacts, feeling romantic about preserving history.
The town hailed him as a hero during a small ceremony; word of his deeds had spread. Pit felt happy and accepted, enjoying a peaceful evening.
Looking back on the week, Pit realized the impact he could have. He decided to embrace his powers fully, feeling at peace with his dual life.

ending: And so, Pit Wilson continued as a guardian of time and protector of his town, ever vigilant and wise.
moral: No matter your age or profession, you have the power to make a positive change in the world.
